episodes.title: Epstein tapes are locked away: Virginia Giuffre's co-writer | Banfield
episodes.description:
Amy Wallace, co-writer of Virginia Giuffre's memoir, "Nobody's Girl," joins NewsNation's "Banfield" to detail her knowledge of the names on Epstein's client list and whether President Trump had any involvement. She tells Ashleigh Banfield the tapes with specific names exist but "no one will be able to find them."

#Epstein #EpsteinFiles #VirginiaGiuffre

episodes.title: Twin Flames Universe being investigated by Mich. attorney general, feds | Banfield
episodes.description:
Twin Flames Universe — a Michigan spiritual organization that romantically pairs people, for a fee — is under investigation by Michigan state authorities and federal officials over allegations it has used coercion to control members. Former member Keely Griffin and Cecilia Peck, director of a Netflix docuseries about the group, join “Banfield” to discuss the announcement.

episodes.title: Diddy and NXIVM leader have similar patterns of behavior: Former member | Banfield
episodes.description:
Former NXIVM member and author Sarah Edmondson joins "Banfield" to discuss parallels between NXIVM leader Keith Raniere and Sean “Diddy” Combs. Both men are accused of using sex, threats and manipulation to build their empires, and both were or are facing sex trafficking and racketeering charges in the Southern District of New York. Notably, they’ve shared the same defense attorney, Marc Agnifilo. Raniere was sentenced to 120 years in prison.

episodes.title: Jay-Z responds to rape allegations, calling it blackmail | NewsNation Prime
episodes.description:
Jay-Z has responded to a lawsuit accusing of raping a 13-year-old girl in 2000, alongside defamed music star Sean “Diddy” Combs. The record executive released a lengthy statement in response to the complaint. In it, Jay-Z claims the lawyer behind the 13-year-old accuser’s suit attempted to blackmail him.

episodes.title: Full interview: Diddy court witness says he saw 8 sex tapes with at least 2 celeb minors | Banfield
episodes.description: In a NewsNation 'Banfield' exclusive, Courtney Burgess says he was given 11 flash drives containing at least eight Sean “Diddy” Combs sex tapes involving eight celebrities. Burgess testified before the Combs grand jury in the Southern District of New York on Thursday.  He tells 'Banfield' that among the eight celebrities who were Combs’ “victims,” “two to three” were minors.

episodes.title: Missing in paradise: Woman vanishes from Bahamian yoga retreat | Banfield
episodes.description:
The Bahamas’ director general of tourism has offered her sympathies to the family of Taylor Casey, a 41-year-old Chicago woman who local authorities say has not been seen for six days. Casey disappeared from a yoga retreat on Paradise Island — five miles from Nassau — on June 19. An active police investigation is currently underway. NewsNation's senior national correspondent Brian Entin visits the retreat to get some answers.
#missing #yogaretreat #banfield

episodes.title: Twin Flames Universe former member: 'Extremely fortunate to get out' | Banfield
episodes.description:
A former member of "Twin Flames Universe" says she's "very grateful" she escaped what she believes was actually a cult. "Unfortunately, anyone can fall prey to coercion," Keely Griffin tells victims advocate Elizabeth Smart during a "Banfield" special report. "It was one giant web of lies that kept getting worse and worse." Cecilia Peck, Netflix's "Escaping Twin Flames" director, investigated the online community and also joins the conversation. 
#twinflamesuniverse #netflix #elizabethsmart

episodes.title: TikTok dancer rebuts ‘cult’ claims of Netflix documentary | Banfield
episodes.description:
7M dancer Miranda Derrick, who’s at the heart of “Dancing for the Devil,” says she’s been receiving death threats because of the Netflix documentary about the NXIVM cult. It tells the story of how Derrick and others were sucked into NXIVM, what they thought was a church combined with a talent agency for TikTok dancers. Now, Derrick is rebutting the claims made about NXIVM founder Robert Shinn. Ashleigh Banfield talks about the controversy with Sarah Edmondson, host of the “A Little Bit Culty” podcast and who calls herself a NXIVM cult survivor. 
#NXIVM #Miranda derrick #Sarah Edmondson

episodes.title: Dancer who left '7M TikTok Cult' speaks out : 'You have to show everything is normal; it's not' | Ba
episodes.description:
Dancer Aubrey Fisher, "7M Films" CEO Robert Shinn's former client, joins "Banfield" to share his story of escaping an alleged TikTok dancing cult. Shinn "wanted to make sure that everything you do is posted so that people see that everything is normal. Make it seem like we're not in a cult basically," Fisher said on "Banfield."

episodes.description:

Advanced regression therapist Lisa Devine joins "NewsNation Now" to discuss Franke's recent comments at her sentencing and how she may still be in a cult-like mentality.

episodes.title: Cult specialist examines 'Soldiers of Christ' religious group | Banfield
episodes.description:
Five adults and a 15-year-old who call themselves members of the “Soldiers of Christ” religious group are in custody on murder charges after a woman’s body was found in the trunk of a car parked outside a popular spa in Atlanta’s suburbs. Cult intervention specialist Ashlen Hilliard joins "Banfield" to discuss the story.

#Cult #Atlanta
